timeline.bodyText: Can we make this comment more descriptive? If not let's remove this comment as it's quite obvious.
timeline.author: chamil321

replies.bodyText: This is a BBE about object methods. Made it more descriptive.
replies.author: KRVPerera

timeline.author: pubudu91
praneesha

timeline.message:

Defining methods outside the objects body is no longer supported
